015package com.google.common.util.concurrent;
016
017import com.google.common.annotations.GwtIncompatible;
018import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
019import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
020import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
021import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
022
023/**
024 * A {@link ScheduledExecutorService} that returns {@link ListenableFuture} instances from its
025 * {@code ExecutorService} methods. To create an instance from an existing {@link
026 * ScheduledExecutorService}, call {@link
027 * MoreExecutors#listeningDecorator(ScheduledExecutorService)}.
028 *
029 * @author Chris Povirk
030 * @since 10.0
031 */
032@GwtIncompatible
033public interface ListeningScheduledExecutorService
034    extends ScheduledExecutorService, ListeningExecutorService {
035
036  /**
037   * @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture)
038   */
039  @Override
040  ListenableScheduledFuture<?> schedule(Runnable command, long delay, TimeUnit unit);
041
042  /**
043   * @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture)
044   */
045  @Override
046  <V extends @Nullable Object> ListenableScheduledFuture<V> schedule(
047      Callable<V> callable, long delay, TimeUnit unit);
048
049  /**
050   * @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture)
051   */
052  @Override
053  ListenableScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(
054      Runnable command, long initialDelay, long period, TimeUnit unit);
055
056  /**
057   * @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture)
058   */
059  @Override
060  ListenableScheduledFuture<?> scheduleWithFixedDelay(
061      Runnable command, long initialDelay, long delay, TimeUnit unit);
062}
